Professional Summary
Backend Software Engineer with 2+ years of experience specializing in Node.js andNestJS development. Proven track
record in building scalable event management systems, implementing real-time features, and developing robust REST APIs.

Currently pursuing a Higher School degree in Computer Science with expertise in PostgreSQL ,microservices and
monolithic architecture , and CI/CD pipelines . Passionate about backend development and system design.
Professional Experience
Portals - Event Management Platform Feb 2025 - May 2025
Backend Developer (Remote) Freelance
•Developed backend services for a large-scale event management platform using NestJS andPostgreSQL

•Implemented real-time notification system using Server-Sent Events (SSE) for instant event updates
•Built comprehensive analytics dashboard and agenda management system with REST API architecture
•Collaborated with a 4-member development team using Prisma ORM for efficient database operations
•Designed and optimized database schemas to handle high-volume event data and user interactions
Education
Higher National School of Computer Science 08 May 1945, Sidi Bel Abb` es Sep 2023 - Present

Higher School Degree in Computer Science Expected Graduation: 2028
•Specializing in software engineering with focus on backend development and system architecture
•Relevant coursework: Algorithms, Data Structures, Database Systems, Software Engineering, Web Development
•Active participant in hackathons with recognition for problem-solving and teamwork skills
Technical Skills
Backend Technologies: NestJS, Express.js, Node.js, REST API, Microservices Architecture

Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Prisma ORM, ElasticSearch
Programming Languages: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python
DevOps & Tools: Docker, Linux, GitHub Actions (CI/CD), Git
Frontend (Supporting): React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS
Concepts: Object-Oriented Programming, Database Design, System Design, Design Patterns
Collaboration Tools: GitHub, Jira, Slack, ClickUp, Figma
Notable Projects
GrowPath - Student-Company Matching Platform |React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS 2025

•Led frontend development for university capstone project connecting students with companies for internships
•Built responsive platform enabling companies to post real-world challenges and discover talented students
•Collaborated with 5-member team (2 frontend, 3 backend) to deliver project-based recruitment solution
•Implemented modern UI/UX with TypeScript for type safety and improved development experience

IntelliPower - AI-Powered Security System |MQTT, IoT, Face Recognition, Real-time Data 2024
•Developed smart security system integrating AI-powered face recognition with IoT devices
•Built system architecture for handling multiple security sensors and surveillance components, render them in 3D
model
•Created comprehensive documentation and open-source repository showcasing technical implementation
Trackiny - Freight Transport Management |React, Next.js, Firebase, React Leaflet Jan 2025

•Developed automated freight transport management platform during hackathon competition
•Implemented real-time driver tracking system with integrated mapping using React Leaflet
•Built responsive dashboard for logistics management with real-time location updates
•Utilized Firebase for real-time database and Zustand for efficient state management
Boumerdes Smart City (BSC) |Next.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Chart.js Nov 2024

•Created tourism platform for Boumerdes city during hackathon, focusing on admin dashboard development
•Contributed to backend development for hotel and tourist attraction reservation system
•Implemented data visualization using Chart.js for tourism analytics and reporting
•Collaborated with cross-functional team to deliver complete tourism management solution

About Me
Hello World! I'm ZAKARIA, a passionate computer science student at L'École supérieure en informatique 08 Mai 1945 de Sidi Bel Abbès (ESI-SBA). I love sharing my journey in the world of coding and creating elegant, user-friendly web applications.
As a Full Stack Developer, I specialize in React development and modern web technologies. My goal is to craft beautiful, performant applications that provide great user experiences.
Quick Facts
🎓 Studying Computer Science at ESI-SBA

🎓 Studying Computer Science at ESI-SBA
💻 Full Stack Web Developer
🌍 Based in Boumerdes, Algeria
🚀 Always learning new technologies

Experience & Projects
Boumerdes Smart City (BSC) - Hackathon Project
Developed a tourism platform for Boumerdes visitors during a hackathon. Created an admin dashboard and contributed to backend development. The platform helps tourists find accommodations, book services, and explore tourist attractions. Features include a booking system for hotels and tourist spots, and a comprehensive dashboard for local authorities to manage tourism data.
